message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I understand its true worth to you surpasses any monetary value. After careful consideration, I propose a price of $950,000 for this product. This offer reflects my commitment to finding a fair solution while maximizing the return on my investment. I believe this price is reasonable and offers a substantial benefit to both parties. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the offer. I look forward to your positive response.
